shortdesc.ph: The base interface class that implements Agora real-time communication core functions.
Provides all methods available for the app to call.
Call the methods of this class to use all features of the Agora SDK.

section.p: is the base class of the Agora Native SDK. You can use the real-time audio and video communication functions provided by Agora by creating an object and calling its methods. Agora ensures the quality of experience (QoE) for global internet-based audio and video communication through a virtual global network optimized for real-time web and mobile applications.

Agora recommends calling the API methods from the same thread to avoid calling them from multiple threads. This class was named AgoraAudio in earlier versions and was renamed to starting from version 1.0.
